control.description: Hidden Button to pass through navigation when recently added is disabled

control.visible: !ControlGroup(9001).HasFocus() + ![Control.HasFocus(8000) | Control.HasFocus(8001) | Control.HasFocus(8002) | Control.HasFocus(8003) | Control.HasFocus(8004)] + [Container(9000).HasFocus(1) | Container(9000).HasFocus(2) | Container(9000).HasFocus(3) | Container(9000).HasFocus(4) | Container(9000).HasFocus(5) | Container(9000).HasFocus(6) | Container(9000).HasFocus(8) | Container(9000).HasFocus(9) | [Container(9000).HasFocus(10) + Skin.HasSetting(HomeFavourites_Shortcuts)] | Container(9000).HasFocus(11) | Container(9000).HasFocus(15) | Container(9000).HasFocus(16)]
